function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through the air due to airborne transmission of particles less than 5 µm in size","Impact":"Increased risk of person-to-person transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict measures for isolating infected individuals and controlling airborne transmission","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems, ventilation systems, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"General population, healthcare workers, individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, employers"}]}
